detail_desc: Shirt in cotton poplin with a grandad collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Jacket in soft, fluffy faux fur with notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and patch front pockets. Lined.

Round sunglasses with metal frames, chain-shaped sidepieces in metal and plastic and adjustable nose pads. Tinted, UV-protective, plastic, polarised lenses. Polarised lenses convey colours more clearly and provide stronger contrasts while preventing glare.
Shiny metal hair grips in various designs.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Elasticated drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.

Track jacket in sturdy jersey with a mesh-lined drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and mesh-lined side pockets with a taped zip. Unlined.
Cycling shorts in stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Quilted jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, wrapover front with concealed press-studs, and welt side pockets. Lined. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers.
Trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved dress in glossy jersey with a print motif on the front. Seam at the waist and a lined tulle skirt with multiple asymmetric tiers and a glittery top layer.

Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, darts and a yoke at the back, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist.
Long cardigan in a soft fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a button, fake front pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Top in ribbed jersey containing glittery threads. V-neck, spaghetti shoulder straps and a straight-cut hem.

Sporty jacket in sturdy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with long, wide puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in airy plumeti chiffon with long raglan sleeves and a decorative drawstring and opening at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and flounces at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Cardigan in soft, organic cotton jersey with a hood, chest pocket and press-studs down the front.
Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with peak lapels, jetted front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Small imitation leather bucket bag with a zip and narrow shoulder strap at the top. Unlined. Size 9x14x16 cm.
Lightly padded jacket in a cotton and nylon weave with a zip down the front and a lined hood with a faux fur trim. Front pockets with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Rib-knit hat containing some wool with a faux fur pompom on the top.
Loafers in imitation suede with a moccasin seam at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sleeveless dress in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with reversible sequins on the front, a gathered seam at the waist and a lined tulle skirt.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Jumper in a soft alpaca and wool knit with a ribbed polo neck. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Dress in an embroidered crêpe weave with a V-neck at the back, ties at the back of the neck and long trumpet sleeves. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Patterned swimsuit with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low, V-shaped waist with decorative straps, a lined gusset and half-string back.

Long-sleeved top and a pair of joggers in cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Short satin nightslip with a V-neck, lace trims at the top and hem, and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
Playsuit in viscose jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front and short sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.

Shirt in a woven, stretch cotton blend with a cutaway collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Ankle-length suit trousers in airy linen with a hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Wide, long-sleeved blouse in a softly draping viscose and silk blend with a V-neck opening and ties at the front. Pleats at the back of the neck and shoulders, and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, V-neck at the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, jetted front pockets and one inner pocket. Fastening with one button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders, a tapered chest, and sharply tapered waist to create a flattering silhouette.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back, and a gently rounded hem.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly with a button. Decorative seams on the back pockets and decorative stitching on the legs.
High profile Chelsea boots in soft leather with elastic gores down both sides of the shaft. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 4 cm.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif on the front and a jersey-lined, wrapover hood with a decorative drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Chino shorts in a washed cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets. Regular fit.
Jersey body in a soft cotton blend with a V-neck and decorative gathers at the bust, narrow shoulder straps and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft. The cotton content of the socks is organic.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Long, pleated dress in airy, crinkled chiffon made partly from recycled polyester. Small stand-up collar with narrow ties at the front, covered buttons at the top and short cap sleeves. Jersey lining.
Short-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Adjustable, glittery, on-ear headphones with padded appliqués at the top. Designed to fit mobile phones with a 3.5 mm socket. Length of wire approx. 120 cm.
High-waisted briefs in cotton jersey with a wide elastic waistband, lined gusset, wide sides, high-cut legs and a high cut at the back.

Shirt in premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a satin bow at the top.
Long-sleeved blouse in satin with a small stand-up collar and concealed buttons down the front. Wide cuffs with a slit and button, and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless romper suits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a kangaroo pocket. Press-stud on one shoulder, press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbed hems.
Shiny metal chain anklets. Adjustable length 21-25 cm.
Elasticated scrunchies in woven fabric with a decorative bow.
Blouse in an airy linen and cotton blend with a small stand-up collar, buttons down the front, long puff sleeves with inset lace trims, narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, leggings and hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a top and pair of trousers in sturdy, textured cotton jersey. Top with long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, buttons at the back of the neck and a straight hem with short slits in the sides. Trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Coat in a woven wool blend with no collar or buttons. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a detachable tie belt at the waist and discreet side pockets. Lined.
Sleeveless top in cotton jersey with a print motif. Frill trim around the armholes.
Straight trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. Side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined, triangular cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Elastic hem, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature. The top has a round neck and short sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help you keep warm while allowing easy access to the bust for nursing.
Briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with a wide elastic waistband. Mid waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour and a straight-cut hem.
Sleeveless top in airy, softly draping jersey with a lace-trimmed V-neck. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined textured bikini top with wide shoulder straps and concealed elastication at the hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in jersey containing glittery threads with a wide flounce at the top and long sleeves.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Straight-cut, double-breasted coat in a wool blend with wide peak lapels, diagonal front pockets, an inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined.
Playsuit in viscose jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front and short sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Flared dress in glittery tulle with a round, satin-trimmed, gathered neckline. Opening and button at the back of the neck and short, flounced sleeves. Underdress with a print motif at the hem.
